alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 3:58AM CDT until June 15 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Dale County in southeastern Alabama... Henry County in southeastern Alabama... Northeastern Coffee County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 445 AM CDT. * At 358 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Blue Springs to near Ariton to 8 miles northwest of Fort Rucker, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Daleville, Abbeville, Headland, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Enterprise, Midland City, Level Plains, Newton, Ariton, Pinckard, Clayhatchee, Newville, Napier Field, Shorterville, Mixons Crossroads, Hunt Field, Waterford, Hooper Stage Field and Gerald. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
